description:
Here is our Tech Fleece Hoodie a little more technical than the others. Made of 100% recycled polyester polar fleece, this hoodie can be worn as a 2nd layer under a shell or on long hikes in the woods and cool summer nights.

The quarter length zipper is enhanced with a flap inside and a chin guard. With a large center pocket accessible through each of the zippers along the body, you'll be able to keep your hands warm! The drawstring waist and adjustable velcro cuffs also help you keep that precious warmth well stored.

Reinforced hood, shoulders and forearms will ensure increased durability over time to help you get through the branches and years without damaging it
name: Hooke Tech Fleece Hoodie - Mens
